alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Elk; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 12:32AM CDT until June 28 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Elk County in southeastern Kansas... Montgomery County in southeastern Kansas... Chautauqua County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1231 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Grenola to 6 miles west of Elgin to 7 miles north of Pearsonia, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Cherryvale, Caney, Sedan, Dearing, Moline, Longton, Elk City, Tyro, Grenola, Peru, Liberty, Chautauqua, Elk Falls, Havana, Elgin, Bolton, Sycamore and Niotaze. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
